name: History Simulation 1
description: A precursor to History Simulation 2 https://hprogrammer.itch.io/history-simulation-2, a very basic simulation where each polity expands to its neighboring cells and adds resources for every tile it conquers. It then uses these resources to hire more agents to further expand its borders. Every time it touches an enemies borders the polity loses resources and the agent loses health. The map is procedurally generated at run time, press r to regenerate the map.
